title: Settings
authSettingsDescription: Configure authentication and user registration settings
disableSignupDescription: When enabled, new users will not be able to create accounts via the registration form. SSO registration may still be allowed.
disableSsoSignupDescription: When enabled, new users will not be able to create accounts via SSO/OAuth providers. UI registration may still be allowed.
mcpSettingsDescription: Configure Model Context Protocol timeout and behavior settings
mcpResetTimeoutOnProgressDescription: When enabled, the timeout will reset each time progress is made on an MCP request
mcpTimeoutDescription: Timeout for individual MCP requests in milliseconds (1-3000 seconds)
mcpMaxTotalTimeoutDescription: Maximum total timeout for MCP requests in milliseconds (1-3000 seconds)
mcpMaxAttemptsDescription: Maximum number of crash attempts before marking MCP server as ERROR (1-10 attempts)
unsavedChangesWarning: You have unsaved changes. Are you sure you want to leave? Your changes will be lost.
signupToggleError: Failed to update UI registration setting
ssoSignupToggleError: Failed to update SSO registration setting
mcpResetTimeoutEnabledSuccess: MCP reset timeout on progress has been enabled
mcpResetTimeoutDisabledSuccess: MCP reset timeout on progress has been disabled
mcpResetTimeoutToggleError: Failed to update MCP reset timeout setting
confirmReset: Are you sure you want to reset all settings to their default values?
resetConfirmation: This action cannot be undone. All custom settings will be lost.
